items.sentence: The climate here is very mild, so it seldom snows here even in the winter.

When you said you'd look after Spot, you knew there'd be responsibilities.

When the teacher is very strict, the students must mind their P's and Q's.
Tom needed a place to stay, so I told him that he could stay at our place.
Tom nearly drowned in the pond near his house when he was three years old.
Tom's girlfriend's ex-boyfriend's girlfriend used to be John's girlfriend.
